name: Teahouse Counter: "Toshimaru"
description: A counter used in a teahouse that is made out of Maple Wood that has been painted in deep colors.\nThis sort of counter has a secret room on the inside and storage space ample enough to hold fourteen dogs the size of Taroumaru, hence its nickname, "Toshimaru."\nThere seems to be no difference in the outer and inner face of the counter, and even the staff sometimes cannot tell which side is which.
